mapper.select: select c.*, b.des bDes, f.des fDes, r.des rDes, e.value, (case when c.alarm_type = 1 then '是' when c.alarm_type = 0 then '否' else '' end) alarmTypeDes from b_define b, f_define f, r_define r, c_define c left join (select tmp1.* from e_data tmp1, (select max(input_time) input_time,s_id from e_data GROUP BY s_id) tmp2 where tmp1.s_id=tmp2.s_id and tmp1.input_time = tmp2.input_time ) e on e.s_id = c.s_id where left(c.s_id, 10) = r.r_id and r.f_id = f.f_id and f.b_id = b.b_id and s_pid is not null and s_pid != '' and c.readorwrite = 0 and c.s_id like concat(#{rId}, '%') and c.s_id like concat(#{rId}, '%') and c.s_type = #{sType} and c.s_id = #{sId} and c.s_pid = #{sPid}

select c.*, b.des bDes, f.des fDes, r.des rDes from b_define b, f_define f, r_define r, c_define c where left(c.s_id, 10) = r.r_id and r.f_id = f.f_id and f.b_id = b.b_id and (c.s_pid = c.s_id or s_pid is null or s_pid = '') and c.readorwrite = 0 and c.s_id like concat(#{rId}, '%') and c.s_id like concat(#{cId}, '%') and c.s_type = #{sType} and c.s_id = #{sId} and c.s_pid = #{sPid}

select t.* from e_list t
t.sId like concat(#{rId}, '%') and t.sId like concat(#{cId}, '%')
select c.c_id, t.s_id, t.input_time, t.value from c_define c, e_data t where c.s_id = t.s_id and c.readorwrite = 0 and t.s_id = #{sId} order by input_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into e_data(s_id, input_time, value) values(#{sId}, UTC_TIME(), #{value})
